string.value: Our analysts are working on materials recovered from the ruins of Base No. 31.
As you already know, the scientists at this base were researching an alien ship.
Pappers, after studying the bodies of astronauts, derived Z-120, a virus that causes rapid and horrific changes in the human body.
There is a hypothesis that this virus ended up on Earth not by accident. Some suspect that it was purposefully sent to us on a reconnaissance ship.
There is also a speculation that Pappers can influence the consciousness of people infected with the virus.
It all sounds terribly confusing, and not all the details are clear, but these circumstances force us to change a number of our previously agreed on decisions.
Specifically, you no longer need to deal with the evacuation of the damned Pappers - this will be handled by a detachment of military police, already sent to the scientist's last location.
You, on the other hand, must at all costs prevent the virus from spreading beyond the cordoned off area.
Note that uninfected civilian casualties are highly undesirable.
A huge number of the Z-120 virus carriers are currently trying to leave the area.
These include looters, infected military patrols, and local residents who were previously hiding from evacuation.
You are the only one close enough to react quickly to the situation.
Several military vehicles are moving at high speed toward the border of the area and are not responding to our radio requests.
There's evidence that they've been infected. Five more minutes and they will be outside the cordoned off area they're supposed to be guarding.
You must intercept them before they spread the infection to the outside world.
Yes, these are the vehicles in question! Attack them, agent!
This issue is now resolved, but stay tuned. The operation to stop the contamination from spreading is in full swing.
By the way, the MP squad has already surrounded the place where Pappers is hiding. I'm expecting the report of his arrest any minute now.
A gang of well-armed looters attacked the town of Fly-Hill.
We know that the local municipality has a helicopter at its disposal.
The aircraft is too small and made almost entirely out of plastic, so it will be extremely difficult for radars to detect.
If the infected escape by helicopter, it's unlikely that we'll be able to bring them down and thus, the world will be brought to the brink of disaster.
According to our experts, you have approximately 10 minutes to stop them.
You must eliminate all the bandits before any of them break through to the helicopter hangar.
Not a single bastard got away, well done!
The MPs have already arrested Pappers. Keep in mind that the information about him being able to control the infected is at least partially confirmed.
A group of infected people took refuge in a thicket of poisonous mushrooms near the Road-River, the exact coordinates are being sent to you now.
These mutants collect fungal spores, the mutagenic nature of which comes from the same source as everything else in the area.
If a large number of spores ends up in a river, the entire downstream area will be contaminated.
You have no more than 15 minutes to destroy these mutants.
The location matches the aerial photography data. Proceed with the mission.
Looks like you made it in time. Of course, we'll have the experts check the river downstream, but I think everything should be fine.
I am proud to inform you, agent, that at this moment our country has been granted emergency powers by the entire world community to destroy the alien aggressor with surface-to-space class missiles.
It appears that the operation to save the Earth is entering its final stage. Return to base.
The infected are leaving, you couldn't find and eliminate them all… We'll have to secure the area using air support.
@ffab1e1eYou CAN'T change the current reality and the territory KICK you out!| |@ffccccccYou haven't passed all the checkpoints. On this note the thread of prophecy is severed.
